message: Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm generous.
You're being too stingy, Alice! I'll take a smaller share this round.
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're still being too greedy, Alice. I'll try to get a better deal this round.
Getting closer, Bob! Meet me in the middle again!
You're not giving me enough credit, Alice. I'm going to try to get a better split this round.
Last chance, Bob! Let's split it fairly!
